title: Account ban?
body: Had a message pop up about a ban and then got kicked out, now I cannot start up the game. I've spent a bit of money on this account and I'd like a bit further understanding as to what exactly is going on with my account.

replies.body: You should have been able to see a reform card detailing the game logs that warranted this suspension. If you can't see it for any reason, you're always welcome to reach out to player behavior for that info and talk about what happened in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Get in line, a ton of people have had accounts banned, I am out hundreds of dollars. Riot refuses to acknowledge that their Instafeedback algorithm is absolutely absurd. The level of theft and unethical practices taking place will be the inevitable doom of Riot.
